name: Archipelago dream festival
description:
A game for the https://itch.io/jam/cozy-autumn-game-jam-2022

It takes place on the archipelago of floating islands above the clouds.

The goal is to deliver different goods for the autumn festival on the central island, specifically:

  • 20 bottles of apple cider and 20 bottles of pear cider.
  • 20 apple pies, 20 pumpkin pies and 20 berry pies
  • 80 crates of apples, 60 crates of pears, 100 pumpkins and 60 sack of berries
  • 1 m^3 of stones and 2 m^3 of woods
  • Music instruments for musicians

How to play

The scheme of the archipelago with producing items

Your truck can load no more then 1700kg or 10m3.
Pies, flour, drinks will not produce anything without ingredients delivered to them first.
You can not ride at night, it is not safe. Every day is shorter than the previous.

To load or unload goods, stop at storage area

On the central island unloading at storage area ends the day.

Islands are not ridable

Controls

WASD or Triggers + Right Stick to control the truck.
Left Stick or Arrow keys to look around.
R or Gamepad West to reset truck in case of emergency.

Developers

Alexander Fedorov - music and coding

Konstantin Novak - 3d modelling and art

OST:

https://soundcloud.com/alexander-fedorov-10/sets/archipelago-dream-festical-ost
